text: Halmstad is a town in the county of Halland in Sweden. It is the seat of Halmstad Municipality. Halmstad is the home of successful sports clubs like Halmstads BK and IS Halmia (association football) and HK Drott (team handball). Swedish pop star Basshunter and Gyllene Tider also comes from Halmstad. ==References== ==Other websites==
title: Halmstad
